rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
调查破坏：粗心和不专心的参与者歪曲了 COVID-19 的清洁习惯调查是收集公共卫生数据的最常见方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Survey-sabotage-careless-and-inattentive-participants-misrepresent-COVID-19-cleaning-habits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Survey-sabotage-careless-and-inattentive-participants-misrepresent-COVID-19-cleaning-habits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46a5304f-9402-4474-9103-171cb01568d1 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 04:40:00 -0400 Survey sabotage: careless and inattentive participants misrepresent COVID-19 cleaning habits
量子医学：前进的道路？研究探讨了量子物理学如何为医学做出贡献。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Quantum-medicine-the-way-forward.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Quantum-medicine-the-way-forward.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cc8cb29-1862-4951-80d8-665bcaf34457 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 04:00:00 -0400 Quantum medicine: the way forward?
新的人工智能系统可能彻底改变瓣膜性心脏病的诊断AI（人工智能）听起来像是一个冰冷的机器人系统，但大阪都立大学的科学家们已经证明，它可以提供温暖人心的支持，或者更确切地说，“心脏警告”支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/New-AI-system-could-revolutionize-the-diagnosis-of-valvular-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/New-AI-system-could-revolutionize-the-diagnosis-of-valvular-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af41d6ec-0037-442c-9d02-48e02f099e5c Thu, 06 Jul 2023 23:16:00 -0400 New AI system could revolutionize the diagnosis of valvular heart disease
免疫疗法显着提高晚期 NSCLC 患者的总生存率由 UCL 和 UCLH 领导并由罗氏赞助的一项全球研究表明，癌症免疫疗法 atezolizumab 显着改善了无法接受含铂化疗的晚期非小细胞肺癌患者的总体生存率，当与单药化疗相比。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Immunotherapy-significantly-improves-overall-survival-for-advanced-NSCLC-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Immunotherapy-significantly-improves-overall-survival-for-advanced-NSCLC-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8275b44b-9a6e-4e83-8256-c1e172929788 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 23:13:00 -0400 Immunotherapy significantly improves overall survival for advanced NSCLC patients
患者的攻击行为会对医疗接待员造成持久伤害昆士兰大学的研究发现，患者对医疗接待员的言语和身体虐待非常普遍，并造成持久伤害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Patient-aggression-causes- permanent-harm-to-medical-receptionists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Patient-aggression-causes- permanent-harm-to-medical-receptionists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9059da87-2f37-47a1-825c-940afc2b3dff Thu, 06 Jul 2023 23:08:00 -0400 Patient aggression causes lasting harm to medical receptionists
冷冻电镜有助于解码神经转运蛋白的分子结构IISc 的研究人员及其合作者利用冷冻电镜（Cryo-EM）这种强大的显微镜技术，解码了控制关键神经递质运动的转运蛋白的分子结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Cryo-EM-helps-decode-the-molecular-architecture-of-a-neural-transport- Protein.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Cryo-EM-helps-decode-the-molecular-architecture-of-a-neural-transport- Protein.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5dddc7a8-853f-4c07-a8e0-ef72821a865e Thu, 06 Jul 2023 23:02:00 -0400 Cryo-EM helps decode the molecular architecture of a neural transport protein
新西兰研究人员呼吁制定紧急法规，保护儿童免受网络世界的伤害新西兰奥塔哥大学的研究人员表示，迫切需要制定法规来保护儿童免受不受监管的网络世界的伤害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/New-Zealand-researchers-call-for-urgent-regulations-to-protect-children-from-harm-in-online-world.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/New-Zealand-researchers-call-for-urgent-regulations-to-protect-children-from-harm-in-online-world.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2166e3be-d412-4afa-97d8-dc0421a4e9b6 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 23:00:00 -0400 New Zealand researchers call for urgent regulations to protect children from harm in online world
新疫苗可保护幼猴免受腹泻并促进生长根据《自然通讯》发表的一项新研究，最初开发用于预防细菌引起的腹泻的疫苗现在也被发现可以帮助非人类灵长类动物婴儿生长得更快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/New-vaccine-protects-infant-monkeys-from-diarrea-and-promotes-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/New-vaccine-protects-infant-monkeys-from-diarrea-and-promotes-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=602d989b-c03c-4ba1-b681-87b092b7923f Thu, 06 Jul 2023 22:57:00 -0400 New vaccine protects infant monkeys from diarrhea and promotes growth
研究发现吃六种主要食物可以降低患心脏病的风险由麦克马斯特大学和汉密尔顿健康科学研究所的人口健康研究中心 (PHRI) 的研究人员领导的一项研究发现，六种主要食物的组合摄入不足与成人患心血管疾病 (CVD) 的风险较高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Eating-six-key-foods-can-lower-a-persons-risk-of-heart-disease-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Eating-six-key-foods-can-lower-a-persons-risk-of-heart-disease-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6519758-dbc9-471e-b42c-883115eb5f4a Thu, 06 Jul 2023 22:48:00 -0400 Eating six key foods can lower a person's risk of heart disease, study finds
研究：健康饮食中可以包含或不包含未加工的红肉和全谷物根据一项在所有有人居住的大陆 80 个国家进行的研究，这项研究今天发表在欧洲心脏病学会期刊《欧洲心脏杂志》上，该研究表明，健康饮食中可以包含或不包含未加工的红肉和全谷物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Study-Unprocessed-red-meat-and-whole-grains-can-be-included-or-left-out-of-a-healthy-diet。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Study-Unprocessed-red-meat-and-whole-grains-can-be-included-or-left-out-of-a-healthy-diet。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9435cd7-d81e-46fa-808d-850bfe0f2569 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 22:43:00 -0400 Study: Unprocessed red meat and whole grains can be included or left out of a healthy diet
